as-is copyright shapecollage applications.graphics app:gui Make picture collages in less than a minute With Shape Collage You can easily create collages in a special shape. The free version is free for personal usage and inserts a Logo into the collage. The pro version for commercial use is fee required and is without logo in the collage. http://www.shapecollage.com/2.5.3/ShapeCollage-2.5.3.tar.gz
